article: My daughter's 7th birthday was April 22. As it was Monday, we preferred to celebrate it _ , i.e. on Saturday, April 20. This was easier for me as I'm _ on Saturdays. On Friday the entire family was busy packing the _ and putting funny pins on them. I promised my little princess that I would wake her up early in the morning and give out the presents to her _ . I woke up at 07:30. After I took a bath, I planned to wake her up. But as I came out from the _ , I realized that an earthquake struck. I _ to wake my husband up and asked him to carry our daughter and ran out of our house. We were _ our house moving from side to side from outside. It lasted for just 3 minutes, but tiles came down, and some narrow gaps appeared on the _ . Nevertheless, as we had planned, I went to my daughter's school at 9:00, but no one was there except the teacher who _ us to get back to our house as _ might come soon. I was shocked, and drove my car home. On the way home I heard a police cry out loud, "Stay _ , no tsunami, it's only issue!" Arriving at my house, I was wondering about the presents: to whom we should _ ? After some discussion, we decided to give them to the children in _ . Entering the hospital, I was shocked to find thousands of people bleeding and lying outside the rooms. A boy came up with a _ on his head. He stared at me with his questioning eyes as if he wanted to say, "Could I have one?" _ I handed over one present to him. I can't ever forget his shining eyes when he received the gift!
